'''Elemental Bait''', made from [[Mist Flower Corolla]], is an item teeming with elemental energy used to attract slimes. The item is introduced in [[Diluc]]'s Story Quest [[Darknight Hero's Alibi (Quest)|Darknight Hero's Alibi]], where it is refined at [[Dawn Winery]] with the help of [[Connor]].
